Data Structures | Macros
UART FIFO
System
Collaboration diagram for UART FIFO:

Detailed Description

This device driver is used to add a FIFO read buffer to a UART port.

Data Structures

struct  uartfifo_cfg_t
 
struct  usbfifo_cfg_t
 

Macros

#define UARTFIFO_DEVICE(device_name, cfg_ptr, state_ptr, mode_value, uid_value, gid_value)
 
#define USBFIFO_DEVICE(device_name, cfg_ptr, state_ptr, mode_value, uid_value, gid_value)
 

Macro Definition Documentation

#define UARTFIFO_DEVICE (   device_name,
  cfg_ptr,
  state_ptr,
  mode_value,
  uid_value,
  gid_value 
)

This defines the configuration values for a FIFO that is connected to an underlying device.

Parameters
device_nameThe name of the device (e.g "uart-fifo")
cfg_ptrA pointer to the const devfifo_cfg_t data structure
state_ptrA pointer to the state structure (see devfifo_state_t)
mode_valueThe access mode (usually 0666)
uid_valueThe User ID
gid_valueThe Group ID

Example:

const device_t devices[DEVICES_TOTAL+1] = {
DEVICE_PERIPH("uart0", uart, 0, 0666, USER_ROOT, GROUP_ROOT, S_IFCHR),
DEVFIFO_DEVICE("uart0-fifo", &devices[0], 0666, USER_ROOT, GROUP_ROOT),
...
DEVICE_TERMINATOR
}
#define USBFIFO_DEVICE (   device_name,
  cfg_ptr,
  state_ptr,
  mode_value,
  uid_value,
  gid_value 
)

This defines the configuration values for a FIFO that is connected to an underlying device.

Parameters
device_nameThe name of the device (e.g "usb0-fifo")
cfg_ptrA pointer to the const devfifo_cfg_t data structure
state_ptrA pointer to the state structure (see devfifo_state_t)
mode_valueThe access mode (usually 0666)
uid_valueThe User ID
gid_valueThe Group ID

Example:

const device_t devices[DEVICES_TOTAL+1] = {
USBFIFO_DEVICE("usb0-fifo", &usbfifo_cfg, 0666, USER_ROOT, GROUP_ROOT),
...
DEVICE_TERMINATOR
}
